post:
<center>With a HostDoc VPS, you are purchasing a production ready VPS that ensures constant stability and performance.

We are OVH, Hetzner and Incero resellers and despite our low end prices, we provide enterprise hardware and support.

As a young company, we are constantly striving to improve our service offerings, responsivenes and also welcome critism as well as feedback. We have slowly begun incorporating SSD and NVMe SSD to our offerings but in a bid to keep prices down, we still utilize HDD heavily.

With HostDoc, you can [create your own plans](https://hostdochosting.co.uk/build-your-own) with specs that suit your needs as well as budget. We have hourly cloud billing with a minimum top up of £5. We provide one of the most stable and uncongested reseller cpanel hosting located in London and shared cpanel hosting in Germany. We are transparent, go the extra mile, and provide a realistic [99.7% uptime guarantee](https://status.hostdoc.co.uk).</center>

We offer the ability to deploy instances in the UK, France, Finland, Germany, Australia, USA, Singapore and Canada.

Our VPS come with:
- Weekly offsite backup and the ability to restore from snapshot backup once a month.
- NoVNC emergency console access.
- Massive library of available OS inc Ubuntu 18.10 and CentOS 7.6
- Numerous ISO available such as Windows 2012 (Bring Your Own License)
- Ability to upload your own ISO
- KVM Virtualisation on ALL plans
- 24/7 Support
- 7 Day VPS no quibbles refund (Not available for promotional plans)
- DDoS Mitigation
- i7, E3 Xeon, E5 Xeon or Gold Xeon Processors.

    1TB Bandwidth
